title: Monrjiall.Observation.found
body:
<<if $sawHelmet is true>>
[[I found this helmet over by that tree... |Mimir.Observation.helmetAnd]]
<<endif>>

<<if $sawShield is true>>
[[There is a shield laying over there... |Mimir.Observation.shieldAnd]]
<<endif>>

<<if $sawGoblet is true>>
[[That goblet there is rather particular .|Mimir.Observation.gobletAnd]]
<<endif>>

<<if $sawBranch is true>>
[[That branch has caught my attention. |Mimir.Observation.shouldnt]]
<<endif>>

<<if $sawBench is true>>
[[That bench looks rather odd... |Mimir.Observation.benchAnd]]
<<endif>>

[[On second thought, let me look around a bit more. |Monrjiall.Puzzles.trials]]

title: Mimir.Observation.shouldnt
body:
It should not.

[[Monrjiall.Observation.maybe]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.maybe
body:
But maybe it came from a faraway land... 
in an epic journey too big for its little being to comprehend.

[[Mimir.Observation.didNot]]

title: Mimir.Observation.didNot
body:
It did not.

[[Monrjiall.Observation.travelling]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.travelling
body:
I can see it now, travelling with its partner...

[[Mimir.Observation.stop]]

title: Mimir.Observation.stop
body:
Let me stop you before you go any further. 
The branch is not from any other realm...
it will not relate to anything here... 
and it is not what you are looking for.

[[Monrjiall.Observation.believe]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.believe
body:
Don’t listen to him, little branch! I believe in you!

[[Monrjiall.Observation.found]]

title: Mimir.Observation.helmetAnd
body:
Ok, and what else?

[[Monrjiall.Observation.helmetOptions]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.helmetOptions
body:
<<if $sawShield is true>>
[[This shield is also very similar and laying on the floor nearby. |Mimir.Observation.hsrelated]]
<<endif>>

<<if $sawBranch is true>>
[[That branch over there! Ha! Once again, I prove myself in excellence of skill. |Mimir.Observation.hbrelated]]
<<endif>>

[[I don’t anything else is relevant to this helmet. |Mimir.Observation.notCare]]

title: Mimir.Observation.hsrelated
body:
Well, yes, those two are most likely related. 
More so, they may have belonged to the same warrior.

[[Monrjiall.Observation.point]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.point
body:
Ha! Point for Monrjiall!

[[Mimir.Observation.hsrealm]]

title: Mimir.Observation.hsrealm
body:
Unfortunately, those don’t seem to have come from any other place. 
They are very logical items to find in a battlefield.
Keep looking, you were very close this time.

[[Monrjiall.Observation.close]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.close
body:
Close to what?

[[Monrjiall.Observation.found]]

title: Mimir.Observation.hbrelated
body:
How can those two items possibly be related??

[[Monrjiall.Observation.easy]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.easy
body:
That’s easy. 
That branch was clearly broken by that helmet... 
as the warrior wearing it fell from the top of the tree.

[[Mimir.Observation.climb]]

title: Mimir.Observation.climb
body:
Why would the warrior be up there? Vikings don’t climb.

[[Monrjiall.Observation.climber]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.climber
body:
For your information, I’m an excellent climber. 
I do it all the time... 
and break branches with my helmet constantly.

[[Mimir.Observation.notItems]]

title: Mimir.Observation.notItems
body:
I have so many questions right now. 
Regardless, those are not the items I was referring to. 
Let’s suppose they are related somehow... 
they do not belong to any other place but here.

[[Monrjiall.Observation.tie]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.tie
body:
Alright, we’ll call this one a stalemate.

[[Monrjiall.Observation.found]]

title: Mimir.Observation.notCare
body:
Then we don’t particularly care for it, do we?

[[Monrjiall.Observaion.itForUs]]

title: Monrjiall.Observaion.itForUs
body:
Neither it for us, I think.

[[Monrjiall.Observation.found]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.shieldOptions
body:
<<if $sawHelmet is true>>
[[There’s also a helmet by a nearby tree. |Mimir.Observation.shrelated]]
<<endif>>

<<if $sawBench is true>>
[[That bench has clearly been used to sit upon. |Mimir.Observation.accurate]]
<<endif>>

[[What do you need something else for? That shield is magnificent! |Mimir.Observation.twoItems]]

title: Mimir.Observation.shrelated
body:
Ah, yes, partially, a warrior’s equipment. 
Most likely related to each other.

[[Monrjiall.Observation.impressive]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.impressive
body:
That’s some impressive observation, right?

[[Mimir.Observation.mostly]]

title: Mimir.Observation.mostly
body:
Mostly, but in this case, not enough. 
Those two may be related, but they also belong to this realm...
And even to this particular battlefield. 
You should keep looking.

[[Monrjiall.Observation.notOver]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.notOver
body:
This is not over, head.

[[Monrjiall.Observation.found]]

title: Mimir.Observation.accurate
body:
I suppose that’s accurate, but..

[[Monrjiall.Observation.tired]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.tired
body:
And people sit when they are tired.

[[Mimir.Observation.yesBut]]

title: Mimir.Observation.yesBut
body:
Yes, but...

[[Monrjiall.Observation.youAsk]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.youAsk
body:
And what makes people tired, you ask?

[[Mimir.Observation.IDoNot]]

title: Mimir.Observation.IDoNot
body:
No, I do not, in fact...

[[Monrjiall.Observation.precisely]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.precisely
body:
Precisely, lifting heavy objects. Such as?

[[Mimir.Observation.resignation]]

title: Mimir.Observation.resignation
body:
*sigh* A shield?

[[Monrjiall.Observation.shieldIndeed]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.shieldIndeed
body:
A SHIELD INDEED!

[[Mimir.Observation.silence]]

title: Mimir.Observation.silence
body:
...

[[Monrjiall.Observation.silence]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.silence
body:
...

[[Mimir.Observation.yourLogic]]

title: Mimir.Observation.yourLogic
body:
Well, although your logic is not technically flawed... 
The shield is not from any other realm but this. 
Try to find something else.

[[Monrjiall.Observation.impeccable]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.impeccable
body:
All I heard was that I have impeccable logic.

[[Mimir.Observation.notEven]]

title: Mimir.Observation.notEven
body:
That’s not even... *sigh*

[[Monrjiall.Observation.found]]

title: Mimir.Observation.twoItems
body:
Yes, but you need to find two items related to each other, remember? 
Items that do not belong here.

[[Monrjiall.Observation.distracted]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.distracted
body:
...

[[Mimir.Observation.attention]]

title: Mimir.Observation.attention
body:
Monrjiall?

[[Monrjiall.Observation.thinking]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.thinking
body:
Sorry, I was thinking of the shield. 
What was it you were saying?

[[Mimir.Observation.nothing]]

title: Mimir.Observation.nothing
body:
Nevermind, just keep looking.

[[Monrjiall.Observation.found]]

title: Mimir.Observation.gobletAnd
body:
It rather is. 
Did you find anything else?

[[Monrjiall.Observation.gobletOptions]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.gobletOptions
body:
<<if $sawBench is true>>
[[I’m still looking for ale to fill it with, so I can sit on that bench to enjoy it. |Mimir.Observation.benchPrecisely]]
<<endif>>

<<if $sawShield is true>>
[[I think that shield is connected to the goblet somehow. |Mimir.Observation.howShield]]
<<endif>>

[[Yes, a sudden craving for a good cup of mead. |Mimir.Observation.material]]

title: Mimir.Observation.benchPrecisely
body:
The bench! Precisely! 
Those two clearly come from some sort of feast, and do not belong in this battlefield. 
[[Mimir.Observation.stumble]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.findAle
body:
<<set $puzzle3complete to true>>
I still think we should find that ale.

[[Monrjiall.Puzzles.trials]]

title: Mimir.Observation.howShield
body:
How do you mean?

[[Monrjiall.Observation.defend]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.defend
body:
Well, I have used a shield to defend my ale more than once. 
It is a logical consequence to think that is what happened here.

[[Mimir.Observation.drinkShield]]

title: Mimir.Observation.drinkShield
body:
Even if bringing your drinks to a battlefield were something people did...
I believe that shield is right where it belongs. 
It did not come from any other realm.

[[Monrjiall.Observation.feelBad]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.feelBad
body:
I still feel bad for the poor fellow who must have dropped his drink... 
Without a shield to protect it.

[[Monrjiall.Observation.found]]

title: Mimir.Observation.material
body:
I meant something material. 
Another item related to the goblet.

[[Monrjiall.Observation.nothingKeep]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.nothingKeep
body:
Oh, no, nothing of the sort. 
I’ll keep looking.

[[Monrjiall.Observation.found]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.benchOptions
body:
<<if $sawHelmet is true>>
[[Well, if benches are falling out of the sky... |Monrjiall.Observation.goodThing]]
<<endif>>

<<if $sawGoblet is true>>
[[Well, it would be a nice place to enjoy a drink in that goblet over there. |Mimir.Observation.gobletPrecisely]]
<<endif>>

[[Yes, the dust sitting on top of it. Clearly not mountain dust. |Mimir.Observation.prettyClean]]

title: Mimir.Observation.benchAnd
body:
It does indeed, anything else?

[[Monrjiall.Observation.benchOptions]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.goodThing
body:
...it’s a good thing I have a... 
...helmet.. 
THAT’S IT!

[[Mimir.Observation.noItsNot]]

title: Mimir.Observation.noItsNot
body:
No, it's not.

[[Monrjiall.Observation.rainingBenches]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.rainingBenches
body:
This bench comes from a realm where people use helmets against raining benches!

[[Mimir.Observation.disappointing]]

title: Mimir.Observation.disappointing
body:
Sorry for disappointing you... 
...but even though the bench most certainly came from a different realm... 
...the helmet did not, and they are most definitely not related at all.

[[Monrjiall.Observation.stillGlad]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.stillGlad
body:
I’m still glad I have my helmet on.

[[Monrjiall.Observation.found]]

title: Mimir.Observation.gobletPrecisely
body:
Precisely. Those two are clearly the items I mentioned earlier! 
Congratulations, Monrjiall!

[[Monrjiall.Observation.whyThanks]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.whyThanks
body:
Why, thank you! 
What items?

[[Mimir.Observation.luckVirtue]]

title: Monrjiall.Observation.thenNo
body:
Ok, then no, nothing else.

[[Mimir.Observation.gettingClose]]

title: Mimir.Observation.prettyClean
body:
There’s no such thing as mountain dust. 
And I can see from here that, aside from leaves and muddy snow on its legs... 
...the bench is pretty clean.

[[Monrjiall.Observation.thenNo]]

title: Mimir.Observation.gettingClose
body:
Well, keep looking, you are getting close.

[[Monrjiall.Observation.found]]

title: Mimir.Observation.shieldAnd
body:
Yes, something else?

[[Monrjiall.Observation.shieldOptions]]

title: Mimir.Observation.stumble
body:
Now, it is obvious that you have stumbled upon the answer rather fortuitously. 
However, luck can be a great virtue in some people... 
And accompanied by the stubborn perseverance you have just showed me, I can declare myself properly impressed.

[[Monrjiall.Observation.findAle]]

title: Mimir.Observation.luckVirtue
body:
<<set $puzzle3complete to true>>

Now, it is obvious that you have stumbled upon the answer rather fortuitously. 
However, luck can be a great virtue in some people, and accompanied by the stubborn perseverance you have just showed me, I can declare myself properly impressed.

[[Monrjiall.Puzzles.trials]]
